info.name: Cafe & Wifi
info.description: This API will give you information about cafes, like names, locations, ratings, etc.

request.description: The /random route will search the cafe's database and return random cafe details.

response.name: Suggest a random Cafe.
response.body:
{
    "can_take_calls": false,
    "coffee_price": "£2.80",
    "has_sockets": true,
    "has_toilet": true,
    "has_wifi": true,
    "id": 6,
    "img_url": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/p/AF1QipN-C650VmJ1XZhzOIBTg1bUu3_to_GHpyrmUplt=s0",
    "location": "Hackney",
    "map_url": "https://goo.gl/maps/DWnwaeeiwdYsBkEH9",
    "name": "Mare Street Market",
    "seats": "50+"
}

request.description: The /all route will search the cafe's database and return all the records.

item.name: Seach A Single Cafe At A Location

request.description: The /search_one will search the cafe's database for a cafe that matches the location queried. Use the loc parameter to pass a location name.

response.name: Seach A Single Cafe At A Location
response.body:
{
    "cafe": {
        "can_take_calls": false,
        "coffee_price": "£2.75",
        "has_sockets": true,
        "has_toilet": true,
        "has_wifi": true,
        "id": 2,
        "img_url": "https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5734f3ff4d088e2c5b08fe13/1555848382269-9F13FE1WQDNUUDQOAOXF/ke17ZwdGBToddI8pDm48kAeyi0pcxjZfLZiASAF9yCBZw-zPPgdn4jUwVcJE1ZvWQUxwkmyExglNqGp0IvTJZUJFbgE-7XRK3dMEBRBhUpzV8NE8s7067ZLWyi1jRvJklJnlBFEUyq1al9AqaQ7pI4DcRJq_Lf3JCtFMXgpPQyk/copeland-park-bar-peckham",
        "location": "Peckham",
        "map_url": "https://g.page/CopelandSocial?share",
        "name": "Social - Copeland Road",
        "seats": "20-30"
    }
}

item.name: Seach All Cafe At A Location

request.description: The /search route will search the cafe's database for all cafe that matches the location queried. Use the loc parameter to pass a location name.

request.description: The /add route will add a cafe details in the database. POST request.
The /update-price/id route will update the coffee price of the cafe selected by cafe id. Use new_price variable to update new price.

response.name: Update Coffee Price Error

request.description:
The /report-closed/id route will delete the cafe record selected by provided cafe id.

Use api-key variable to provide top secrete key for authorization.

response.name: Delete A Cafe Record Success
Delete A Cafe Record Error
Delete A Cafe Record Not Allowed
